<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set locked-to-id"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/locked-to-id/bulk"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the locked-to-id value for multiple assets. This is commonly used by MDM integrations to lock devices to an external identifier or to clear a lock when devices are released.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Collect asset IDs via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) or [POST /api/v1.0/assets/by-assetname](/docs/api/assets/get-assets-by-name).
2. **LockedToId** - Obtain the identifier from your MDM or external system (or set `null` to clear the lock).

**Workflow Example**
1. Gather the assets that need to be locked or unlocked.
2. [POST /api/v1.0/assets/locked-to-id/bulk](/docs/api/assets/bulk-set-locked-to-id) with `AssetIds` and the `LockedToId` value.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `AssetIds` (request body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request to bulk set locked-to-id values on assets","properties":{"AssetIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"List of asset UUIDs to update"},"LockedToId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The locked-to identifier value to set"}},"required":["AssetIds"],"title":"SetAssetsLockedToIdRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
